import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function AboutUs() { return (
{/* Header */}

About Us

Empowering Job Seekers with AI-Powered Resume Analysis

{/* Content Section */}
{/* Our Mission */}

Our Mission

At ATS Resume Reviewer, we help job seekers optimize their resumes for **Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)**, ensuring they stand out to recruiters and hiring managers.

{/* Our Features Section */}

AI-Powered ATS Scanning

We analyze your resume using cutting-edge **AI & NLP** to match it against job descriptions and highlight missing keywords.

Data-Driven Resume Optimization

Get actionable insights to improve your resume's ATS score and **increase your chances of landing an interview.**

Tailored Keyword Suggestions

Our system identifies **missing industry-specific keywords** and suggests improvements to align your resume with job postings.

Seamless User Experience

Enjoy an intuitive and user-friendly interface with **real-time feedback and detailed reports.**

{/* Call-To-Action Section */}

Ready to Optimize Your Resume?

Start using our **ATS Scanner** and get instant feedback on your resume.

{/* Footer */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} ATS Resume Reviewer. All rights reserved.

); } export default AboutUs;
